comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Herbert Livingston Satterlee (two Ts), Assistant Secretary of the Navy (1908-1909); husband of Louisa Pierpont Morgan, J. P. Morgan's sister.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for pointing out the correct spelling of the name and providing further identification information.  We'll edit the source data to fix the name and then reload the description to Flickr.
